overview: Hot Desert Knights is proud to celebrate "20 Years of HDK MEN". Real hardcore men doing what men do best - Raw, Hot, Sweaty, Bareback Sex. To celebrate HDK's 20th Anniversary making bareback movies we are releasing the 1st in a set of 3 special collectors editions, each dedicated to a specific genre: HDK MEN, HDK BOYS & HDK FISTING This 1st edition is a special collector's edition of our greatest bareback moments from the past two decades featuring nothing but hardcore muscle stud HDK MEN.
title: 20 Years of HDK Men
